argumentText:
ARGUMENT
i j

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | dmatid.a | |- A = ( N Mat R ) |
| 2 |  | dmatid.b | |- B = ( Base ` A ) |
| 3 |  | dmatid.0 | |- .0. = ( 0g ` R ) |
| 4 |  | dmatid.d | |- D = ( N DMat R ) |
| 5 | 1 | #P_matring | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) -> A e. Ring ) |
| 6 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( 1r ` A ) = ( 1r ` A ) |
| 7 | 2, 6 | #P_ringidcl | |- ( A e. Ring -> ( 1r ` A ) e. B ) |
| 8 | 5, 7 | #P_syl | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) -> ( 1r ` A ) e. B ) |
| 9 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( 1r ` R ) = ( 1r ` R ) |
| 10 |  | #P_simpl | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) -> N e. Fin ) |
| 11 | 10 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) /\ ( i e. N /\ j e. N ) ) -> N e. Fin ) |
| 12 |  | #P_simpr | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) -> R e. Ring ) |
| 13 | 12 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) /\ ( i e. N /\ j e. N ) ) -> R e. Ring ) |
| 14 |  | #P_simpl | |- ( ( i e. N /\ j e. N ) -> i e. N ) |
| 15 | 14 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) /\ ( i e. N /\ j e. N ) ) -> i e. N ) |
| 16 |  | #P_simpr | |- ( ( i e. N /\ j e. N ) -> j e. N ) |
| 17 | 16 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) /\ ( i e. N /\ j e. N ) ) -> j e. N ) |
| 18 | 1, 9, 3, 11, 13, 15, 17, 6 | #P_mat1ov | |- ( ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) /\ ( i e. N /\ j e. N ) ) -> ( i ( 1r ` A ) j ) = if ( i = j , ( 1r ` R ) , .0. ) ) |
| 19 |  | #P_ifnefalse | |- ( i =/= j -> if ( i = j , ( 1r ` R ) , .0. ) = .0. ) |
| 20 | 18, 19 | #P_sylan9eq | |- ( ( ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) /\ ( i e. N /\ j e. N ) ) /\ i =/= j ) -> ( i ( 1r ` A ) j ) = .0. ) |
| 21 | 20 | #P_ex | |- ( ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) /\ ( i e. N /\ j e. N ) ) -> ( i =/= j -> ( i ( 1r ` A ) j ) = .0. ) ) |
| 22 | 21 | #P_ralrimivva | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) -> A. i e. N A. j e. N ( i =/= j -> ( i ( 1r ` A ) j ) = .0. ) ) |
| 23 | 1, 2, 3, 4 | #P_dmatel | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) -> ( ( 1r ` A ) e. D <-> ( ( 1r ` A ) e. B /\ A. i e. N A. j e. N ( i =/= j -> ( i ( 1r ` A ) j ) = .0. ) ) ) ) |
| 24 | 8, 22, 23 | #P_mpbir2and | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) -> ( 1r ` A ) e. D ) |
